name: money-printer-server
description: Command runner for the Money Printer server project

scripts.test: docker exec --tty -e MP_ENVIRONMENT=test $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) sh -c 'python bin/dev/test.py'; exit $?
scripts.test:focus: docker exec --tty -e MP_ENVIRONMENT=test $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) sh -c 'pytest -n 1 -m focus --cov-config=.coveragerc --cov=src --cov-report term:skip-covered src/'; exit $?
scripts.test:ci: docker exec -e MP_CI=true -e MP_ENVIRONMENT=test $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) sh -c 'python bin/dev/test.py'; exit $?
scripts.gendoc: docker exec --tty $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "MP_ENVIRONMENT=development PYTHONPATH=src python bin/dev/gendoc.py"
scripts.db:migrate: docker exec --tty $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic revision --autogenerate"
scripts.db:update: docker exec --tty $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=development alembic upgrade head"
scripts.db:test:update: docker exec --tty $(docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps -q api) /bin/bash -c "cd src && MP_ENVIRONMENT=test alembic upgrade head"
scripts.recycle: npm run down; sleep 1 && npm run build; sleep 1 && npm run start
scripts.recycle:prod: npm run down:prod; sleep 1 && npm run build:prod; sleep 1 && npm run start:prod
scripts.restart: npm run stop; sleep 1 && npm run start
scripts.restart:prod: npm run stop:prod; sleep 1 npm run start:prod

author: Tim Gittos
